channel.title: Need help i added Woodccutting & mining
channel.description:

I Added Mining & WoodCutting, but i don't know whats wrong it spam this error,

Okay So line 571 i got this (Process),
[CODE] if (mining[0] > 0) { if (goodDistance(objectX, objectY, absX, absY, 1)) { (Line: 571 )-> getPA().mining(); } }[/CODE]
And in PlayerAssistant class therere a error line 637
[CODE]if ((System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastAction > c.actionInterval) && c.IsMining) { addSkillXP(c.mining[2], c.playerMining); refreshSkill(c.playerMining); (Line: 637)-> c.getItems().addItem(c.mining[4], 1); c.sendMessage("You manage to mine some ores."); c.lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); } } else { c.sendMessage("Not enough space in your inventory."); resetMI(); return false; }[/CODE]
[12/24/09 10:44 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerAssistant.mining(PlayerAssistant.java:637) [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 25, 2009, 12:21:12 am[/size][hr]bump

item.title: Need help i added Woodccutting & mining
item.dc:creator: @sabsabi sabsabi

Okay So line 571 i got this (Process),

if (mining[0] > 0) { if (goodDistance(objectX, objectY, absX, absY, 1)) { (Line: 571 )-> getPA().mining(); } }

And in PlayerAssistant class therere a error line 637

					[CODE]if ((System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastAction > c.actionInterval) && c.IsMining) {
						addSkillXP(c.mining[2], c.playerMining);
						refreshSkill(c.playerMining);
			(Line: 637)->	c.getItems().addItem(c.mining[4], 1);
						c.sendMessage("You manage to mine some ores.");
						c.lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("Not enough space in your inventory.");
					resetMI();
					return false;
				}[/CODE]
